overview: Inkorrektes is certainely John B. Root's most personal and controversal porn film. "Inkorrektes" seems to be an easy comedy but, in fact, it tries to go deep into questions like "why do we have sex?" "Who should we have sex with?" And the story is driven by the girls. Sorry : all the dialogs are in french. :-( PS. "Inkorrektes" has been extremely censored on french tv. 5 minutes cut, especially in the dialogs. We present the uncensored version here.
title: Inkorrektes
